name: Sacrifices must be made - Ludum Dare 43

description:
Sacrifices must be made - Ludum Dare 43 is a game developed by bobleny. It was originally released in 2018.
You can play Sacrifices must be made - Ludum Dare 43 on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
